Nodes¶

This documentations refers to the explanation of each node of the pipeline. In this concept, each node is a step in the ETL pipeline.

Data Preparation¶

src.nodes.data_preparation.run(client, params)[source]¶

Data Gathering¶

src.nodes.data_gathering.done(client, params)[source]¶

Verify if each file name is in the intermediate_data directory.

src.nodes.data_gathering.update(client, params)[source]¶

Download the file for the specific date.

Data Storage¶

src.nodes.data_storage.done(client, params)[source]¶

Verify if table exists in the database.

src.nodes.data_storage.update(client, params)[source]¶

Store table in database.

Data Transformation¶

src.nodes.data_transform.done(client, params)[source]¶

This always return False.

You’ll always update the node status.

src.nodes.data_transform.update(client, params)[source]¶

Perform the data cleaning and transformation.

Data Visualization¶

src.nodes.data_viz.done(client, params)[source]¶
src.nodes.data_viz.update(client, params)[source]¶
